mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Miley, Michael, 1841-1918
mdRecord.dcterms:description: These pictures are portraits of a young girl in the Brown family. Pose 1 is a close-up of her face. In Pose 2, she is seated in a chair. The glass plate negatives were inscribed with Janice Brown. These prints were made from the original glass plate negatives, which are housed at Virginia Historical Society.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Portraits of Young Girl in Janice Brown Family (photographs)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Portrait photography
Virginia -- Rockbridge County
Twentieth century
